
{{Server function}}
This function destroys a [[/textitem.md|textitem]] object.

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
void textDestroyTextItem ( textitem theTextitem )             
</syntaxhighlight> 

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theTextitem:''' The text item you wish to destroy.

==Example== 
This example creates then destroys a [[/textitem.md|textitem]].
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
-- Create a new text item
text = textCreateTextItem ( "Hello, world!" )
-- Destroy it
textDestroyTextItem ( text )
</syntaxhighlight>
